channel.title: Authors on Samden Lepcha
channel.description: Recent content in Authors on Samden Lepcha

item.description:
Welcome to my Web Site! A Little About Me.

I am a recent Computer Science graduate with a passion for data. I have always firmly believed that anyone who utilises and understands the importance of data has a great advantage over others. Today I am a data science intern at TEG Analytics and mainly work in the Healthcare Insurance domain. I am a member of the Product Development Team where we constantly trying to build new data products that derive value and insights for our clients.

I’m excited about taking new challenges as a Data scientist or Business Analyst. Though I am passionate about this domain, I also love to read books and travel from time to time.
